thread.title: Purple Haze Properties CEO Andrew Pitsicalis Confirmed to Speak at the Southwest Cannabis Conference and Expo in Phoenix About Jimi Hendrix Licensing Opportunities
thread.title_full: Purple Haze Properties CEO Andrew Pitsicalis Confirmed to Speak at the Southwest Cannabis Conference and Expo in Phoenix About Jimi Hendrix Licensing Opportunities

title: Purple Haze Properties CEO Andrew Pitsicalis Confirmed to Speak at the Southwest Cannabis Conference and Expo in Phoenix About Jimi Hendrix Licensing Opportunities
text:

NEW YORK Oct. 20 2015 /- Purp... It is quite a privilege for me to be added as a speaker at the upcomi...Pitsicalis' partner is Leon Hendrix bloo... I know my brother would have been a huge fan of the things that we ha... http://feeds.bio-medicine.org/latest-medical-technology Date:10/20/2015 
NEW YORK , Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Purple Haze Properties CEO Andrew Pitsicalis has been added as a speaker at the Southwest Cannabis Conference and Expo that is scheduled to take place on October 27 th and 28 th in Phoenix, AZ. Pitsicalis will be speaking about Jimi Hendrix licensing opportunities in the cannabis industry. (L to R) Leon Hendrix, blood brother of legendary guitarist Jimi Hendrix and partner in Purple Haze Properties. Andrew Pitsicalis, CEO of Purple Haze... 
"It is quite a privilege for me to be added as a speaker at the upcoming Southwest Cannabis Conference at the end of the month. I look forward to discussing the things I've experienced while working in the Jimi Hendrix cannabis space and listening and learning from everyone else who will be there," states Purple Haze Properties CEO Andrew Pitsicalis . 
Pitsicalis' partner is Leon Hendrix , blood brother to the guitar legend. Purple Haze Properties licenses a variety of Jimi Hendrix related merchandise in the cannabis industry under the Jimi's Cannabis Collection. Everything from rolling papers and pipes to vitamin water and hard candies have all been created under licensing deals with Purple Haze Properties. 
"I know my brother would have been a huge fan of the things that we have been doing with Purple Haze Properties. His creative spirit lives on in everything we do," states Leon Hendrix . 
Purple Haze Properties will also be appearing at the 4 th Annual Marijuana Business Conference & Expo in Las Vegas . Andrew Pitsicalis and Leon Hendrix will have a booth at the oldest and largest national cannabis tradeshow. The company will be unveiling their line of Jimi Hendrix-themed gourmet macaroons, Jimi's Medicated Macaroons. The complete multi-flavor line will be available in the state of California to start and will expand to other locations in the future. More information on the gourmet macaroons can be found at http://www.jimismedicatedmacarons.com . 
Pitsicalis was also recently inducted as a National Board Member of The National Cannabis Chamber Of Commerce. The NCCC works to promote and advocate pro-business policies in the cannabis marketplace. 
"The National Cannabis Chamber of Commerce is excited to have Andrew Pitsicalis become the latest edition to our expanding national board of directors," said Michael Miller president of The National Cannabis Chamber of Commerce. Additionally, "Purple Haze represents the premier celebrity cannabis brands and this is just the first of many other celebrity brands to come." 
Purple Haze Properties, LLC was founded through a partnership between Andrew Pitsicalis and Leon Hendrix , blood brother to the legendary guitar icon. Purple Haze Properties, LLC is one of the premiere sources for Jimi Hendrix cannabis related products. They participate in all aspects of the cannabis industry including Licensing, Social, Medical, Music and Entertainment areas. 
For more information, please visit: http://purplehazeproperties.com or call 1-800-291-3239 Pacific Time.
